info.Description: Scraped 800K+ records from a Hong Kong based online forum with 9th highest internet traffic, and built a dashboard to display findings and insights about the website in 2021, e.g. popular topics, gender distribution by channel, user growth, etc.
Built various mainstream machine learning algorithms (e.g. Decision Tree, Random Forest, Neural Network) from scratch using minimal external libraries.
A simple drawing application on the web to create 8-bit pixel art.
Built a pipeline to scrape and process source code from 1,000+ data science notebooks collected from Kaggle and identified the most widely used Pandas functions and data science libraries.
Implemented various recommendation algorithms including content-based recommendation using TFIDF and collaborative filtering using SVD.

info.Mame: Exploratory Data Analysis of NBA Shot Logs
info.Description: Based on data of the 14-15 season, explored various areas relating to offense and defense of teams and individual players, e.g. most effective defensive players, teams' play style, hot hand phenomenon, etc.
Scraped ~1M records from the largest restaurant guide in HK and developed a 3-classes (positive, neutral, negative) sentiment classification model with 70% accuracy using Word2Vec and BiLSTM.

Developed a convolution neural network to identify 120 dog breeds with 88% validation accuracy using transfer learning with InceptionResNetV2, and deployed the model on a web app to showcase the results.
Scraped 12,000+ records and developed a model with XGBoost that predicts restaurant popularity based on various factors, such as location, cuisine type and price range.
